data.name: Deadside "Hooligan" Skin Set
data.detailed_description:
A set of skins for those who want to explore the dangerous world of Deadside with style.
Contains ingame Hooligan Skin for these items:

Bomber Jacket
Hunter Jacket
Hunter Pants
Gorka Jacket
Gorka Pants
Hiking Jacket
Hiking Pants
Jeans Jacket
Jeans
Military Jacket
Military Pants
Tracksuit Jacket
Tracksuit Pants
Assault Vest
Heavy Assault Vest
Tactical Armored Vest
Police Vest
Bag
Assault Backpack
Stalker Backpack
Typhoon Backpack
Baseball Hat
Panama
Hat
Heavy Assault Helmet x2
Hard Hat
Moto Helmet
Ballistic Helmet
Ballistic Helmet mk2
Tactical Helmet
Tactical Helmet mk2
Field Vest
Tactical Vest
Hunter Vest
Balaclava
Buff
Police Mask
Ski Mask

data.supported_languages: English, Russian, French, German, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3 / AMD FX
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 1030 / RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
